We are proud to bring you the Ultimate Guitar Tone App!
PLAY WITHOUT LIMITS - Anywhere, Anytime.

Rock on,
The Positive Grid Team

Hi there,

This update consists of the following changes:

Improvements:
- BIAS AMP 2 integration is now for free!
- We added more cab selection for you to enjoy!

Bug fix:
- Fixed the crash issue caused by backing up presets

Hi there,

- Added more amps and effects to each license

Hi there,

We deliver what we've promised.
This update is for the MIDI support that you all have been waiting for!
Sorry for the long wait and we definitely drank way too much coffee...

Rock on!
The Positive Grid Team

Hi there,

We apologize for the inconvenience from the previous version.

This quick update is for fixing the following MIDI issues:
- Virtual (BLE) MIDI connection
- Switching presets using MIDI PC (Program Change) command

Hi there,

We hear you!
We added a global MIDI control assignment in the MIDI settings menu for:
1. Next/previous preset
2. Utility - Tuner, Tap Tempo, Metronome
Hope this can be more useful!
